ABOUT

I’m a Software engineering student with hands-on experience in developing Al-driven applications. Proficient
in building intelligent, scalable software using modern frameworks and tools. Adaptable and collaborative,
capable of thriving in diverse environments. Dedicated to delivering high-quality, real-world solutions under
tight deadlines, with a strong commitment to continuous learning and innovation.
